summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the acceptance of Deed for real property located within the boundaries of the Seattle-Kent Good Neighbor Program established in Ordinance 112824, and acquired under the provisions of the Good Neighbor Program or in connection with the settlement of certain property damage claims; also authorizing the sale of such property in the public interest in accordance with the recommendations of the Midway Coordinating Committee recognized in Ordinance 112999; further authorizing the execution of Statutory Warranty Deeds for the sale of such property and the deposit of sale proceeds into the Solid Waste Fund; and directing periodic reports of all such real estate transactions to the City Council.
